Package com.cafean.client.ui.util

Class OptionalEditorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.client.ui.util.OptionalEditorUtil
  • public final class OptionalEditorUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class containing static utility methods intended to be used by optional property editor classes.
    See Also:
    OptionalPropertyEditor

    • Method Summary

      • setActive

        public static void setActive​(boolean active,
                             java.lang.Object target,
                             AbstractModel model,
                             boolean fireGlobalEvents,
                             java.beans.PropertyDescriptor descriptor)
        Sets the given property active in the given target object
        Parameters:
        active - the active value to assign
        target - the Object in which to set the value
        model - the AbstractModel that contains the target
        fireGlobalEvents - if true, global events will be fired
        descriptor - a PropertyDescriptor describing the property

      • setActive

        public static void setActive​(boolean active,
                             java.lang.Object[] targets,
                             AbstractComponent[] components,
                             AbstractModel model,
                             boolean fireGlobalEvents,
                             java.beans.PropertyDescriptor descriptor)
        Sets the given property active in the given target object
        Parameters:
        active - the active value to assign
        targets - an Object[] containing the objects in which to set the value
        components - an AbstractComponent[] of the components that will be modified
        model - the AbstractModel that contains the target
        fireGlobalEvents - if true, global events will be fired
        descriptor - a PropertyDescriptor describing the property

      • updateVersion

        public static void updateVersion​(java.lang.Object target,
                                 java.lang.String editName,
                                 javax.swing.undo.CompoundEdit compound)
        Calls updateVersion() on the component that contains the given target object, if any.
        Parameters:
        target - the Object for which to update the current version
        editName - a String containing the name to use for the version edit
        compound -
        See Also:
        UndoableVersionChange, AbstractComponent.updateVersion()

      • updateOwnership

        public static void updateOwnership​(java.lang.Object target,
                                   boolean fireGlobalEvents,
                                   AbstractModel model,
                                   javax.swing.undo.CompoundEdit compound,
                                   java.beans.PropertyDescriptor descriptor)
        Updates the attribute ownership information for the given object if it is a component and the given model has an active ownership manager.
        Parameters:
        target - the Object for which to update ownership information
        fireGlobalEvents - if false, no update will be performed
        model - the AbstractModel from which to retrieve the ownership manager
        compound - a CompoundEdit in which to place the resulting edit
        descriptor - a PropertyDescriptor describing the component level property that is being modified
        See Also:
        AbstractModel.getOwnershipManager(), OwnershipManager

      • isActive

        public static boolean isActive​(java.lang.Object[] targets,
                               java.beans.PropertyDescriptor descriptor)
        Returns true if the requested property is active in all of the given targets.
        Parameters:
        targets - an Object[] containing the target objects to check
        descriptor - a PropertyDescriptor describing the property to check
        Returns:
        true if the property is active in all objects
        See Also:
        PropertyController.isPropertyActive(java.lang.String)
